synopsis.text: After interfering with Black Widow's secret mission, the vigilante Punisher is taken into custody by S.H.I.E.L.D. Director Nick Fury then orders Punisher and Black Widow to team up. Their mission: stop the global terrorist group Leviathan from selling stolen S.H.I.E.L.D. technology to the highest bidder. Punisher had previously apprehended arms dealer Cain, who possessed the stolen tech. By tracking Cain, the unlikely duo discover a Leviathan base housing a lab that turns spies into super-powered soldiers. With the world's fate hanging in the balance, can the spy and vigilante overcome their differences to prevent Leviathan from unleashing dangerous weapons and technology? The mission will test their tentative alliance to the extreme.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
